message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $14,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,000. I think that's a fair price for the product.
